description: This dataset contains economic variables gathered from the American Community Survey (ACS) from 2019 to 2022. It includes economic variables related to household income and poverty from the ACS 5 year estimates.
source: American Community Survey 5-year data - U.S. Census Bureau

variables.name: below_poverty_p
variables.description: Percent of all people below the poverty line in the past 12 months
variables.units: Percent out of total geography population

variables.name: families_below_poverty_p
variables.description: Percetage of all families with related children of the householder under 18 years
variables.units: Percent out of total geography population

notes: GEOIDs correspond to Census tracts for the given year of the dataset. Note that Census tract boundaries have changed after the 2020 decennial census, which may affect geographic consistency over time.
